extension.description: Subscene.com provides subtitles in more than 50 languages, mainly in English, Arabic, Brazilian Portuguese, Farsi, Indonesian and Vietnamese. Other languages with a great number of subtitles are: Danish, French, Swedish, Dutch, Italian, Norwegian and Spanish.[CR][CR]Note: Needs kodi-vfs-rar and/or kodi-vfs-libarchive addon to extract rar files.
